microsoft/KBLaM

lets you plug structured knowledge bases into LLMs for efficient, scalable augmentation

Related repos

  • framework for domain-specific knowledge extraction and reasoning with LLMs
  • Transforms unstructured text into knowledge graphs for LLM-powered data analysis
  • Semantic layer for connecting LLMs to structured data
  • Open-source toolkit for building scalable LLM inference infrastructure
  • tools for building and evaluating advanced LLM reasoning algorithms
  • framework for fast, resource-efficient LLM inference on local hardware
  • Builds knowledge through conversations with LLMs
  • fine-tune LLMs, generate synthetic data, collaborate on datasets
